statements.sql: select name,photo,grade from business where id = 1
select u.name,ord.uid,ord.id,ord.data from orderform as ord,user as u where express=2 and ord.uid = u.id and bid =1
select d.*,u.name,ord.uid,ord.id,ord.data  from details as d,orderform as ord,user as u where express=2 and ord.uid = u.id and oid=27

params.hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
